content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Hiring Services” text_orientation=”center” button_one_text=”Contact Us” button_two_text=”Get A Quote” background_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.61)” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://partydecorhire.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Untitled-design-1.png” parallax=”on” background_blend=”overlay” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” content_font_size=”20px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Wether you are planning a corporate event, wedding or special function, we are able to offer you an extensive range of hiring equipment including tables, chairs, table linen and a fantastic range of décor to create a fabulous function. No event is too small for us.
Why not pop into our shop to see our ranges for yourself? Our friendly staff will assist you to fine tune all your requirements.

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”10px||20px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”DECOR ACCESSORIES” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Whether your theme is sophisticated, vintage, classic, shabby-chic, retro, rustic or something completely different, we have the ingredients to complete the look.

Or stock includes various candelabras and lanterns, picture frames and blackboards, bird cages, old books, lace overlays, wooden signs and stumps, table numbers, baskets, hearts, floral wreaths and much, much more.

Our easy-to-assemble wedding arch, domed gazebo, pillars, guest stand, easel, isle hooks and isle carpets are all essentials for the perfect event.

Share your pictures and ideas with us and we are bound to find all the components to decorate your themed function.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”TABLES, CHAIRS & LINEN” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||400″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]Our tables are wooden trestles, to seat 8 – 10 people. We have both rectangular and round tables with table linen to fit. This comes in black and white in various sizes with a selection of colourful and stylish table runners or overlays.

Our white plastic chairs are stackable, and we offer either black or white stretch covers with a range of co-ordinating tie-backs.[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”CUTLERY & CHINA” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]We hold 2 ranges of stainless-steel cutlery; the basic Eloff range and the more sophisticated Newport range.

Our white Continental China is perfect for every occasion and includes side plates, fish plates, dinner plates, dessert bowls, pasta bowls and platters. We also stock tea cups and saucers, coffee mugs teapots, milk jugs.

For a special occasion tea party, we have now introduced a mix and match range of Delft china for the discerning customer.[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”GLASSWARE” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]We have two ranges of table glassware. Our basic range consists of red and white wine glasses, champagne, whisky, hi-ball, zombie, beer and sherry glasses.

The fine Vino glasses are for red and white wine, champagne and Martini.

We stock glass water jugs, carafes and juice dispensers.[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Candles” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||400″ _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” header_font=”|||on|||||” sticky_enabled=”0″]

We make all our candles in house and as they are recycled, they are much more cost effective than purchasing candles that burn away.

Our pillar candles come in various heights and are of two widths; 7.5cm and 11cm. We also make floating candles.

We have a beautiful selection of tea-light votives and candle sticks which are a must to bring atmosphere to your celebration.

Our fairy lights come in 4 meter, 10 meter and 20 meter lengths.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://partydecorhire.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/Party-Decor-Hire-testimonials.png” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”0px||2px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”1300px” custom_padding=”80px||80px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”Alegreya Sans||||||||” background_color=”rgba(245,245,245,0.77)” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”65px||65px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“The team at Party Décor Hire offered me great service, they have exceptional talent and a genuine love for what they do.
They were so helpful in guiding me to achieve the perfect look and feel for my wedding, whilst remaining sensitive to my budget.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][lwp_image_carousel gallery_ids=”420,421,422″ show_dots=”off” show_arrows=”off” autoplay_animation=”on” pause_on_hover=”off” infinite_animation=”on” vertical_layout=”off” adaptive_height=”off” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/lwp_image_carousel][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
